price: 27. Y, ciertamente, hemos expuesto a los hombres en este Corán todo tipo de ejemplos para que puedan reflexionar.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ḍarabnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
